name: egoistically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows you consider yourself and your own needs to be more important than anything or anyone else: An action can be seen as egoistically motivated if it brings some benefit to the person who performs it. Various factors may influence whether people behave egoistically or altruistically. Synonym
egotisticallyRelated word
egotistic
More examplesFewer examplesShe was egoistically concerned only with her own preservation.The author believes that we are biologically programmed to act egoistically.It is egoistically rational for people to care about their own future rather than anyone else's.
